title: Ohhhhh myyyyy gooooood. Patch 5.9
body:
Thoughts?

Holy quacker moly that is a crazy patch. Who's as keen as I am?

I'm personally super keen on pretty much all the changes! Really excited for Brand, Malzahar, Cassiopeia, Vel'Koz, Anivia and Syndra! Also, these dragon changes are gonna shift the meta SO hard I reckon.

The two things I'm a little iffy about at the moment, are the two new AP items, the Hextechs. I just feel like the active effects will feel super wonky and be super out of character for most champions, visually and practically.

Also, in competitive play, I'm sure well defined team comps will become a very important thing and grabbing the correct, specific dragons will be super important while denying your opponents' desired ones will also be quite paramount. Although, I feel like Solo Queue, especially in lower elo, the Fire Dragon will be the absolute most important one, since all anyone does is fight.

Again, thoughts?

EDIT: Patch **_6.9_** I can't change it anymore :( My bad lmao

replies.body: Not keen... Look at malzhar and his opness. HOWEVER, I am very very freaking keen for the elemental dragon

OH WOOPS

Also, I'm aware they aren't in the current patch but rather the next one :P
